Isaac Turner
2014 Sep 24

chr22.1Mbp.uniq.fa was generated by taking hg19 chr22:17,000,000-17,999,999 and
adding unique kmers (k=63) to the start and end.

Unique kmers added were:
GGTCGCACACAAATACTACGGGCATTGGATGCGACCATAAGTCTTGACAGGCTTTGTTCCCT
ACAACTTAACCTGGAACTAGAACTAATTTATGAGCGAGCCAGAACAGGTAGTCTGAGGGAGT

Regenerate with: `make`
